what_was_completed: Added appshak_observability module with server.py, broadcaster.py, and models.py.
Exposed GET /api/snapshot using StateView.snapshot() contract only.
Exposed WS /ws/events with async event fanout from durable/read-only sources.
Added tests for snapshot schema and event streaming behavior.
notes: In standalone observability mode, snapshot.running can be false while queue depth and event stream remain active.
Checkpoint recorded per user request to preserve current state/progress.
